description: The Bramble is a favorite&nbsp;winter warmer that was created in London by Dick Bradsell. This delicious cocktail mix features dry gin, lemon juice with simple syrup, and crème de mûre for flavor—it's most similar to other drinks found on this list but also has something special!
name: Bramble
recipeIngredient: Blackberries and lemon wedge for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Add the ice, gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker. Shake well.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the ice, gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker. Shake well.

recipeInstructions.name: Using a strainer, pour the mixture into a pre-chilled old-fashioned glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with the crème de mûre.
